abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.brief_title: P.h.d candidate at Eurecom, France with a strong background as a Data Scientist/Data engineer.
abstract.introduction: Bachelor's degree in foreign language, Master of Engineering.
abstract.work_experience: I have worked in the industry for 7 years. Abundant and rich experiences in data analysis, machine learning projects, especially Natural Language Processing fields.
abstract.work_environment: 3 years in Germany and 3 years in France. Although English is the default communication language, I have made my best efforts to master local languages.
abstract.research_experience: Currently, my research field is in explainable AI, validation of simulation models. I have proposed a variable selection method using Maximum Mean Discrepancy.

education.title: Education
education.master_school: Nara Institute of science and Technology
